New Records: Quentin Grimes scored 20 points in the third quarter, the most he has scored in any quarter in his career, surpassing his previous high of 19 points
Key Match Events: Quentin Grimes scored 17 straight points for Dallas at one point of the third quarter and the start of the fourth
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks suffered their fourth straight loss to the Cleveland Cavaliers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks dumped Tim Hardaway Jr.'s bloated salary and three second-round picks to the Detroit Pistons in exchange for Quentin Grimes
Others: Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving were out for the game due to unknown reasons
